clients.title: Complete & Update Your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile
description: Our data analysis shows lawyers with complete profiles in Justia’s Lawyer Directory receive 76 times more client contacts than those with incomplete profiles. If you don't already have a short biography on your profile, include one highlighting your interests and qualifications, showing potential clients that you’re the best choice. Make sure to add a professional, high quality photo of yourself and keep it up to date. We also recommend updating the Languages and Fees information - Do you offer Free Consultation? ¿Hablas Español?
Completing your profile will help you connect with clients and generate more leads. If you need help accessing your profile, contact us!

jld.title: Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews
description: The Justia Lawyer Directory now features attorney reviews and ratings. Don’t miss out on your chance to showcase your Justia Lawyer Rating badge on your websites, blogs, and other properties!
